messages.subject: Re: Greek Orthodox
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/25/00 2:32:40 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Are you Greek Orthodox? I ve been wanting to visit our local Greek Orthodox church (church
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/25/00 2:32:40 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
samiot@... writes:

> The birthday parties have always been
> just family but this year she wants to have a "Name Day Party" (Greek
> Orthodox) on her name day November 25 and invite her friends.

Are you Greek Orthodox? I've been wanting to visit our local Greek Orthodox
church (church shopping) but don't know enough about it to feel comfortable.

Could you email me with a little background on customs, faux-pas, and such?

TIA

:-) Diane
